Acceptance criteria

  • Print version of the report should fit the A4 page size
  • It's acceptable to have multipaged report
  • Entries are sorted by eater first name + last name

Acceptance criteria

  • By default the report shows only those users, who have days with no OrderItems in the Order
  • MenuToolbar has Show all switcher (default state is off)
  • Enabling Show all swithcer shows all users in the report.

Acceptance criteria

  • UI/UX as on mockup
  • report should have a Print button

Report shows whether each user has ordered something for each day of week
It should be displayed as Users/Days table

Acceptance criteria

  • Mockup is created
  • Endpoint for this type of report is created
  • All eaters should be presented in the report
  • Each report entry represents user and checkmarks meaning user has ordered something or nothing for each day of week

Steps to reproduce:

  1. Go to /foodlord/weekly-menu/ and create a new menu.
  2. Select a dish from any category (don't hit enter)
  3. Close and open dish selection popup with selected item highlighted
  4. Hit ENTER key twice.

Expected behavior:
Dishes are added to menu properly.

Actual behavior:
Server responses with 500 status code with error:
{"timestamp":"2020-03-13T09:59:05.254+0000","status":500,"error":"Internal Server Error","message":"could not execute statement; SQL [n/a]; constraint [null]; nested exception is org.hibernate.exception.ConstraintViolationException: could not execute statement","path":"/api/menus/1/items"}

Server logs:

2020-03-13 11:58:28.212 ERROR 6300 --- [nio-8083-exec-4] o.h.engine.jdbc.spi.SqlExceptionHelper   : ОШИБКА: повторяющееся значение ключа нарушает ограничение уникальности "menu_item_date_dish_id_key"
  Подробности: Ключ "(date, dish_id)=(2020-03-13, 1)" уже существует.
2020-03-13 11:58:28.285 ERROR 6300 --- [nio-8083-exec-4] o.a.c.c.C.[.[.[.[dispatcherServlet]      : Servlet.service() for servlet [dispatcherServlet] in context with path [/api] threw exception [Request processing failed; nested exception is org.springframework.dao.DataIntegrityViolationException: could not execute statement; SQL [n/a]; constraint [null]; nested exception is org.hibernate.exception.ConstraintViolationException: could not execute statement] with root cause

org.postgresql.util.PSQLException: ОШИБКА: повторяющееся значение ключа нарушает ограничение уникальности "menu_item_date_dish_id_key"
  Подробности: Ключ "(date, dish_id)=(2020-03-13, 1)" уже существует.

letters"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Nina Novoselska"},{"name":"created","value":"1574870973392"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"214"},{"name":"description","value":"

When you enter number with integer and decimal part, like '111.11'
validation works fine only for decimal part - you cannot enter letters to the end of number, like '111.11u' but it is possible to move the cursor before decimal point and enter some unallowed symbols, like '11u1.11'

Acceptance criteria

  • Dish is copied on update
  • In case the updated Dish is used in a purchased Menu the old version of the Dish should be preserved in the Menu
  • In case the updated dish is used in a Menu other than purchased, the new updated version of the Dish is used

Foodlord archives used Dishes instead of deleting them
Acceptance criteria

  • If a Dish is used in purchased menu its "Delete" button is replaced by "Archive"
  • "Not used" Dishes can be deleted
  • Archived dishes can not be added to the Menu
